channel.title: Reference on Hoosier Mesh

item.title: Reference
item.description:
These pages provide detailed reference information for Meshtastic node configuration and advanced features.

Configuration Reference Guides

  • Node Configuration Reference - Complete list of all node configuration options with recommended settings for the Indiana mesh network
  • Advanced Configuration - MQTT & Telemetry - MQTT setup, Serial configuration, Telemetry, and External Notifications
